org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http

Class HttpProtocolException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.ProtocolException
          • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http.HttpProtocolException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, HttpConstants

    public class HttpProtocolException
extends ProtocolException
implements HttpConstants
    Represents a violation of the HTTP protocol. This kind of exception is thrown by the HTTP codecs when a problem is detected while encoding or decoding a message.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
